"Give them a chance, I'm sure they'll like you." Airbomber whispered back t=
o Infectra...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 3:23 AM
  Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


  *Infectra smiles waves to any bots in the Maxi base* I=
nfectra: I don't think they like me. *Infectra whispers to Airbomber*
    -=
---- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

    Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 11:47 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast War=
s


    "Sure, we'll tell ya." Airbomber said, making sure nobody was aimin=
g their blaster's at Infectra.

    "Hey, everyone! This is Infectra! She's=
 with us!" Airbomber said. Plintissa growled.

    "These Radicons fired at=
 me, Artist, and Dracona when we tried to help them and ran away! I don't t=
hink they could be trusted!" Plintissa said.

    "We have our gestalt form=
 and we're useful and powerful." Stranato said. Plintissa walked away angri=
ly...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
    =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 7:12 PM
      =
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Infectra nods and follows the Radicons=
* Infectra: How can you tell if one is not to be trusted? *Infectra says to=
 the Radicons*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE =

        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 5:36 =
PM
        Subject: Neo Beast Wars


        Sinesis and Sinister both kept=
 poking each other, but saying nothing when the other looked. They both gra=
bbed their swords and were about to stab each other, but they put the sword=
s away and did a cheesy hug instead.

        Plintissa and Dracona decided=
 to follow Artist and they walked off to the Ark. Once there, they entered =
the base.

        "Hey, have any of you seen a bot come by here just stari=
ng?" Plintissa asked. Dracona started to look around in logical places a lu=
natic might hide.

        Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting around an=
d drinking tea and they left again.

        "Who shall we join with, dear?=
" Inzola asked.

        "Whomever wants out assistance." Deemos replies. T=
hey walk on until they see the Alliance base.

        "This one looks good=
, lets go and ask them if they have any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola a=
nd Deemos walked up to the base.

        "Ahem, excuse us, but we're looki=
ng to join your fine team, we have been looking for a faction to join, and =
it appears that it is you who will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we =
wish to join you, what fo we have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something =
reasonable, please, no killing a bot things or anything.)

        Gangon h=
ad a nightmare, He was again tied to the magical chair when Sinister and Si=
nesis came up to him. Then BrightBlade did, and then Dracona. They all pull=
ed of their masks and were 2 headed, one head Inzola, and the other head De=
emos. Gangon screamed and held hbis head in pain. Gangon woke up, and remem=
bered that he couldn't move. He considered that thing about getting a repla=
cement body, how it would be a good idea just in case he had to get out of =
this dump, which was probable if he wanted to kill himself. He waited for P=
lintissa and Dracona to come back.

        The Radicons looked at Infectra=
.

        "Now, all you need to do is follow us, we have set you on friend=
 of the Maximals, I'm sure they won't mind, seeing as how you would make a =
great addition to their group." Airbomber said. They walked inside of the M=
aximal base, waiting for Infectra to follow.

        Artist walked around =
the war room in circles, not quite knowing where he was going.
